Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Joy Beach Hotel in Santorini (Perivolos), you'll be convenient to Perivolos Beach and Waterpark Santorini. This beach apartment is within close proximity of Perissa Beach and Museum of Minerals and Fossils.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 12 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and private pools. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Kitchenettes are outfitted with refrigerators and stovetops. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment.

Amenities
Relax and unwind with body treatments and facials. After a day at the private beach, you can enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a seasonal outdoor pool. This apartment also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the apartment's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a computer station, and express check-in. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
